name: Tent A — Beachfront View
short: A cozy beachfront tent perfect for couples or solo travelers. Enjoy the sea breeze and sunrise views right from your tent door.

name: Native Kubo — Family Space
short: A native-style bamboo kubo ideal for small families or groups. Comfortably furnished with local charm and sea views.

name: Beach Cottage — Oceanfront Stay
short: A spacious cottage by the shore with private seating area and easy access to the beach. Perfect for a relaxing weekend.
